tools.heroSubtitle: Professional equipment at your fingertips. Rent locally from neighbors and save up to 70% on your next project.
tools.searchPlaceholder: Search for a tool (e.g. Hammer Drill)
tools.howItWorksSubtitle: Get the professional equipment you need for your DIY projects in three simple steps.
tools.step1Desc: Find the right tool and check availability for your project dates. Pay securely through our platform.
tools.step2Desc: Coordinate a pickup with the owner or opt for our convenient local delivery service right to your door.
tools.step3Desc: Drop the tool back to the owner once you've finished your project. Leave a review to help others.
tools.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of tool owners earning an average of $350/month by renting out their equipment.

plan.category.placeholder: e.g., I want to replace the vinyl flooring in my bathroom with ceramic tile. The room is about 5×8 feet...
plan.media.title: Upload photos of your space

plan.analysis.failedSubtitle: We couldn't generate your project plan. Please try again.
plan.preview.generatingSubtitle: Our AI is generating a photorealistic preview of your completed project.
